author: Stephanie Eckardt
title: We Compiled the Amy Schumer Highlights -- The Cut
text:
Amy Schumer. Photo: Craig Blankenhorn
Amy Schumer's hour-long HBO special started with the comedian taking the stage at the Apollo Theater toting a mostly empty bottle of wine, and it only got better from there. If you missed the show when it first aired Saturday, check out the highlights below.
